Blog

Code Test with Prism.js!

10/26/2013

SCSS:

Check out some syntax highlighted SCSS:

.class {
	width: 50px;
	height: 20px;
	@include box-sizing(border-box);

	.nested-class {
		background: yellow;
	}
}

HTML:

Check out some syntax highlighted HTML:

<!-- You must HTML encode your markup before using it in the code tag -->
<span class="row">
	<span class="grid-4 columns"></span>
	<span class="grid-4 columns"></span>
	<span class="grid-4 columns"></span>
</span>

JavaScript:

Check out some syntax highlighted JavaScript:

var foo = function(args) {
	args = "yay!";
	return args;
}
Hand crafted by Demetri Ganoff.
